name: Chimera Tail: Enhanced Edition
description:
Plot:

Samuel is having a hard time with things. He is currently enamored of the young Melissa who lives nearby, but each time he seemingly gets a chance to get closer to her the opportunity is spoiled by the sudden onset of turning into a quivering mess and being unable to speak. Luckily he can rely on his brothers to support him, well maybe he can, if he helps them with their problems first. Will he and his brothers win the hearts of their respective fair maidens, or will they have to spend the rest of their lives alone...together. 

It's not easy being a chimera.

Chimera Tail: Enhanced Edition is a 'remaster' of ChimeraTail. 

It features a higher resolution, an updated user interface, it also includes more and varied background music as well as an overhaul on the character emotions displayed throughout the story.

---

Characters:

Chimera:

Samuel and his two brothers each make up one third of a single chimera.

Samuel (Snake (Tail)) - [Main character]

Samuel, appointed as the 'Youngest' brother by democratic vote, is the sharp witted one. Generally easy going, and quick to try and lead, though the other two don't always listen, he always has a plan for any situation. Except when Melissa is involved. Then he throws caution to the wind, along with his ability to hold any sort of reasonable conversation...

Leonardo (Lion (Head)) -

Leo, the self proclaimed Eldest Brother, was always the straight forward one. Almost to the point of childlike simplicity. Always says what he thinks but doesn't always think about what he says.

Gordon (Goat (Head)) -

Gordon, the appointed Middle brother, is the mild mannered one. Always acts polite and has the aura of a gentleman about him.

Love Interests:

Melissa (Medusa) -

Melissa is a young Medusa who has captured, unbeknownst to her, the heart of our MC Samuel. She lives nearby and has known the Trio of brothers for a while now and word has it that she enjoys sports.

Helen (Harpy) -

Not much is known about this young Harpy except that she only appeared in town recently...

Persephone (Human) -

Persephone is like the Big sister the three brothers never had. She has lived next door for as long as they could remember and has always treated them kindly. Not bad, for a Human.

Statistics:

The game contains 929 dialogue blocks, containing 5,734 words and 28,995
characters, for an average of 6.2 words and 31 characters per block.

The game contains 26 menus, 83 images, and 23 screens.

Contains 2 possible endings, as well as a bonus post story section.

Credits:
